Name: Banana Cocktail With Almonds and Cinnamon
Description: Blend all ingredients
Ingredients:
120g Banana,
 20g Natural Yogurt,
 10g Almonds

Name: Fruit Salad with Avocado Muss
Description:
Peel orange and pear, cut into pieces. Peel banana, slice it. 
Peel avocado, mince using fork and mix with lemon juice and mint. 
Mix fruits and pour avocado muss on it.
Ingredients:
150g Banana,
 130g Pear,
 150g Orange,
 40g Avocado,
 20g Lemon,
 2g Herbs

Name: Peach Shake with Oatmeals
Description:
Pour hot water on oats, leave it for 10 minutes. 
Blend oats with peach, peeled banana and almond milk. 
Enjoy.
Ingredients:
220g Almond Milk,
 130g Banana,
 80g Peach,
 30g Oats

Name: Dessert with Raisins, Yogurt and Mandarine
Description:
Peel mandarine, cut into pieces. Cut nuts. Mix raisins, mandarine pieces, nuts and yogurt. 
Pour it with honey.
Ingredients:
120g Mandarine,
 24g Nuts,
 30g Raisins,
 10g Honey,
 90g Natural Yogurt

Name: Grated Carrot with Orange
Description:
1. Peel the carrot and grate 
2. Cut the orange in half and hollow the pulp. Remove white pellets and cut finely. 
3. Mix orange with carrot and olive oil 
4. You can serve in halved orange halves
Ingredients:
220 g (2 large pieces) Carrot,
 480 g (2 pieces) Orange,
 10 g (1 tbsp) Olive Oil

Name: Cottage Cheese with Yogurt, Banana, Honey and Oats
Description:
1. Mix cottage cheese with yogurt, honey and oats. 
2. Add sliced banana and mix
Ingredients:
185 g (1 medium) Banana
 120 g (4 slices) Cottage cheese
 75 g (½ pack of 150 g) Natural yogurt
 4 g (1 tbsp) Oats 
 5 g (1 tbsp) Honey

Name: Sandwiches with Avocado Paste
Description:
1. Chop the onion finely 
2. Avocado slice in half, remove the pome, hollow the pulp with a spoon and then mash with a fork 
3. Combine the ingredients, add two tablespoons of lemon juice (or lime) 
4. Spread the paste on whole-grain bread
Ingredients:
105 g (3 slices) Whole wheat bread 
 70 g (½ pcs) Avocado 
 25 g (0,2 pcs) Onion 
 20 g (¼ pcs.) Lemon 
 2 g (1 pinch) Spices

Name: Banana Orange Coctail with Cinnamon and Ginger
Description:
1. Squeeze the juice from the orange, cut the banana into thick slices 
2. Pour the juice and almond milk into the blender, add the banana, cinnamon and ginger. 
Blend all ingredients.
Ingredients:
240 g (1 pc) Orange
 200 g (0.9 cup) Almond Milk
 170 g Banana
 5 g (2 1/2 pinches) Herbs

Name: Green Avocado&Pineapple Smoothie
Description:
1. Peel the avocado and remove the seed.
2. Wash the spinach
3. Mix all the ingredients
4. If necessary, add half a glass of water
5. Optionally - add juice squeezed from a half of lemon.
Ingredients:
210 g Pineapple
 140 g Avocado
 100 Spinach fresh or frozen

Name: Tofu Cheese with Chickpeas and Pepper
Description:
1. Mash tofu with fork, add yogurt and mix. 
2. Add chopped peppers and chickpeas and mix. 
3. Eat with bread.
Ingredients:
220 g Tofu
 80 g Natural Yogurt
 30 g Chickpeas
 120 g Pepper
 35 g Whole Meal Bread

Name: Avocado and Parsley Cocktail
Description:
1. Wash, peel and cut avocado. 
2. Mix together with kefir, oats, parsley and lemon juice.
Ingredients:
45 g Avocado
 150 g Natural Kefir
 14 g Oats
 480 g Lemon

Name: Vegan Watermelon&Banana Shake with Chia Seeds
Description:
1. Wash fruits. 
2. Place peeled watermelon, banana and almond milk into blender. 
3. Mix all the ingredients. 
4. Add chia seeds into blender. Blend again. 
5. Shake is ready. You can also put it aside and wait until shake will get thicker.
Ingredients:
220 g Almond Milk
 150 g Watermelon
 90 g Banana
 20 g Chia Seeds

Name: Nut Cream with Couscous and Pear
Description:
1. Put a boiled almond milk over couscous and leave to swell. 
2. Grate the pear and mix with couscous. 
3. Sprinkle with nuts.
Ingredients:
6 g Nuts
 39 g Couscous
 170 g Pear
 220 g Almond Milk

Name: Apple and Nuts Salad
Description:
1. Peel celery. 
2. Grate celery and apple. 
3. Add few drops of lemon juice. 
4. Mix with yogurt. 
5. Sprinkle some crushed nuts on the top.
Ingredients:
340 g (2 middle pcs) Apple
 12 g Nuts
 200 g Celery (root)
 120 g Natural Yogurt
 40 g (1/2) Lemon

Name: Banana-Orange Cocktail with Cinnamon and Ginger
Description:
1. Squeeze orange, slice banana. 
2. Add to blender squeezed orange juice and almond milk, add banana, cinnamon and ginger. 
Mix all ingredients.
Ingredients:
240 g Orange
 200 g Almong Milk
 170 g Banana
 5 g Herbs

Name: Cottage Cheese with Yogurt, Banana, Honey and Oats
Description:
1. Blend cottage cheese with yogurt, honey and oats. 
2. Add sliced banana and mix.
Ingredients:
185 g Banana
 120 g Cottage Cheese
 75 g Natural Yogurt
 4 g Oats
 5 g Honey

Name: Pineapple Cocktail with Avocado
Description:
1. Cut ingredients into smaller pieces. 
2. Blend everything.
Ingredients:
110 g Carrot
 90 g Pineapple
 185 g Banana
 60 g Avocado

Name: Banana-Orange Smoothie
Description:
Slice banana, peel orange and slice it too. 
Everything put into blender, mix until smooth consistency. 
You can add some water.
Ingredients:
160 g Banana
 480 g Orange

Name: Baked aubergine chips with honey and thyme
Description:
4 SERVINGS: 
Preheat the oven to gas 6, 200 C, fan 180 C. 
Combine the flour, polenta and some seasoning in a large bowl. 
Toss the aubergine through the mix until evenly coated. 
Line 2 baking trays with nonstick baking paper and lightly brush or spray with olive oil (2-3 sprays on each tray), 
then put the aubergine on the trays. 
Lightly brush or spray the aubergine with oil, 
then drizzle with the honey and scatter over the thyme. 
Toss to coat, then bake for 20 mins, flipping the aubergine every 5 mins. 
Finely chop half the mint leaves and combine in a bowl with the yogurt and garlic. 
Transfer the aubergine to a plate and sprinkle with cayenne pepper, the remaining mint and a drizzle of honey, 
if you like. 
Serve with the yogurt dip.
Ingredients:
25g plain flour
 25g polenta
 2 aubergines, sliced into chips
 olive oil, for greasing
 3 tbsp clear honey, plus extra to serve (optional)
 6 thyme sprigs, leaves picked
 15g fresh mint
 100g 0% fat Greek-style yogurt
 ½ garlic clove, crushed
 cayenne pepper

Name: Beetroot Cocktail with Banana, Orange and Oats
Description:
To one pot pour some almond milk, add banana. 
Peel orange and beetroot, slice it, place in blender. 
Add also oats. 
Everything blend till smooth.
Ingredients:
240 g Orange
 220 g Almond Milk
 100 g Beetroot
 60 g Banana
 20 g Oats

Name: Kiwi with Mandarine, Pineapple and Seeds
Description:
Wash fruits, peel and slice it. 
Sprinkle with sunflower seeds.
Ingredients:
160 g Kiwi
 120 g Mandarine
 120 g Pineapple
 30 g Sunflower Seeds
